lines.name: Crocodile
lines.line: I am Sobek, son of Neith, master of tides and god of the Nile.

lines.name: Sobek
lines.line: And who are you little human? Are you bringing me entertainment?

lines.name: Steve
lines.line: I am Steve Jones, proud archeologist and expert in ancient Egypt. I am here to complete your trial and get your artefact.

lines.name: Sobek
lines.line: So you are here to steal my properties! How would a god like me be stupid enough to let you go without trouble?

lines.name: Sobek
lines.line: You know what? I defintly am stupid enough to let you do that. I will even help you in your quest.

lines.name: Sobek
lines.line: Here is my personal cloud. Take it with you and taste the power of rain. (Button Fire 1)

lines.name: Sobek
lines.line: Do not get me wrong here. I do not trust your abilities to complete my trial. But it may end up as a great show.
